/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

In the foreground, a red car and a white car are parked on the street, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. A building with a red roof stands prominently in the background, its vibrant hue contrasting with the blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene.

The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, giving it a unique perspective and depth. Despite this distortion, the image provides a vivid depiction of a day in the life of this vibrant city.
